an4.201:1.3: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an4.201:1.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an4.201:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipati hoti, adinnadayi hoti, kamesumicchacari hoti, musavadi hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthayi hoti.
an4.201:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attana ca panatipati hoti, paranca panatipate samadapeti;
an4.201:3.3: attana ca adinnadayi hoti, paranca adinnadane samadapeti;
an4.201:3.4: attana ca kamesumicchacari hoti, paranca kamesumicchacare samadapeti;
an4.201:3.5: attana ca musavadi hoti, paranca musavade samadapeti;
an4.201:3.6: attana ca suramerayamajjapamadatthayi hoti, paranca suramerayamajjapamadatthane samadapeti.
an4.201:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an4.201:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attana ca panatipata pativirato hoti, paranca panatipata veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.201:5.3: attana ca adinnadana pativirato hoti, paranca adinnadana veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.201:5.4: attana ca kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, paranca kamesumicchacara veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.201:5.5: attana ca musavada pativirato hoti, paranca musavada veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.201:5.6: attana ca suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti, paranca suramerayamajjapamadatthana veramaniya samadapeti.
